title: Richard Graham – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Richard Graham, the Conservative MP for Gloucester, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
What we need above all now is a PM with strong economic understanding and judgement. Have confirmed to my constituents on Radio Glos am in no doubt that person is Rishi Sunak.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund

  *[AOA]: The Airport Operators Association

  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[PISA]: Programme for International Student Assessment
  *[PIRLS]: Progress in International Reading Literacy Study
